name: AnimatedDefaultTextStyle
desc: Animated version of [DefaultTextStyle] which automatically transitions the default text style (the text style to apply to descendant [Text] widgets without explicit style) over a given duration whenever the given style changes.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: textAlign
fields.desc: How the text should be aligned horizontally.

fields.name: softWrap
fields.desc: Whether the text should break at soft line breaks.

fields.name: overflow
fields.desc: How visual overflow should be handled.

fields.name: maxLines
fields.desc: An optional maximum number of lines for the text to span, wrapping if necessary.

fields.name: textWidthBasis
fields.desc: The strategy to use when calculating the width of the Text.
